page.title: 08Life styles,Hair,Customs
page.content: A survey at the local hairdresser's found that the most popular style for men is short hair at the front, sides and back. For women the most popular style is permed hair with pointed sides and the front brushed back.For girls it is a "step" or mushroom cut, so called because it looks like a mushroom. Punk styles are worn by some young people. Here the hair is spiked and stands straight up on end as if the person has seen a ghost.Sometimes it is dyed bright colours. There is also a very short "skinhead" cut. Both of these fashions are very spectacular,but neither is really popular with the people we interviewed. Many people used he hairdressers regularly,but a large number, especially children, had their hair cut by their relations or neighbours in their own homes.
